game: Enter a game world full of adventure! Increase your level, choose the profession you want, buy various items, and get rare items. Collect as much wealth as possible and prove yourself to be the best on the leaderboard!
cryptonft: Explore the world of crypto by buying and selling coins/tokens and NFTs to make a profit. Use the trading terminal provided to invest, trade, and become the best investor or trader ever!
walletminingstaking: With Crypto Wallet, you can store and send assets to other users. Additionally, earn crypto coins/tokens by mining, or staking to earn rewards and help support the blockchain network.
